    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Prenos toplote, prevajanje toplote</string>
            <string language="en">Heat Transfer, Conduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeübertragung, Übertragung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transfert Thermique, Conduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transferência De Calor, Condução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scambio di calore, Conduzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταφορά θερμότητας, διεξαγωγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Traspaso térmico, Conducción</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prevajanje toplote skozi zid in potrebna moč, da držimo željeno temperaturno razliko</string>
            <string language="en">Heat transfer through the wall and power needed to keep constant temperature inside.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prevajanje toplote</string>
            <string language="en">heat transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">toplota</string>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeübertragung durch die Wand und die Energie
mußte konstante Temperatur nach innen halten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le transfert thermique par le mur et la puissance
a dû garder la température constante à l'intérieur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transferência de calor com a parede e a 
potência necessitou manter para dentro a temperatura constante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo scambio di calore con la parete e l'potenza ha
dovuto mantenere la temperatura costante all'interno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μεταφορά θερμότητας μέσω του τοίχου και της δύναμης
έπρεπε να κρατήσει τη σταθερή θερμοκρασία μέσα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El traspaso térmico con la pared y la potencia 
necesitó guardar temperatura constante adentro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeübertragung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transfert thermique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la chaleur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
